Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Enacts the Critical Infrastructure Standards and Procedures Act
Summary: Enacts the "critical infrastructure standards and procedures (CRISP) act"; requires the office of information technology, along with the division of homeland security and emergency services and the department of financial services to identify critical infrastructure, both public and private, that could be comprised by cyber-attacks.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state technology law, in relation to enacting the "critical infrastructure standards and procedures act"
